Class SuggestButtonService

Handles button interactions for suggestions, including voting and starting discussion threads.

Methods

| Edit this page View Source

PrivateThreadStartOrJoin(string)

Starts or joins a private discussion thread for a suggestion.

Declaration
[ComponentInteraction("privatesuggestthread:*", false, RunMode.Default)]
public Task PrivateThreadStartOrJoin(string suggestnum)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string suggestnum

The unique identifier of the suggestion for which to start or join the discussion thread.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

Similar to PublicThreadStartOrJoin(string), but for private threads. It ensures that discussion threads are accessible only to relevant members.

| Edit this page View Source

PublicThreadStartOrJoin(string)

Starts or joins a public discussion thread for a suggestion.

Declaration
[ComponentInteraction("publicsuggestthread:*", false, RunMode.Default)]
public Task PublicThreadStartOrJoin(string suggestnum)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string suggestnum

The unique identifier of the suggestion for which to start or join the discussion thread.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

This method checks if a public discussion thread already exists for the suggestion and either joins it or creates a new one.

| Edit this page View Source

SendSuggestModal()

Initiates the process for a user to send a suggestion through a modal interaction.

Declaration
[ComponentInteraction("suggestbutton", false, RunMode.Default)]
public Task SendSuggestModal()
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

This method prompts the user with a modal to input their suggestion, which is then processed accordingly.

| Edit this page View Source

UpdateCount(string)

Updates the vote count for a suggestion based on user interaction with emote buttons.

Declaration
[ComponentInteraction("emotebutton:*", false, RunMode.Default)]
public Task UpdateCount(string number)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string number

The number associated with the emote button, representing a specific suggestion option.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

This method allows users to vote on suggestions using emote buttons. Users can change their vote or remove it entirely.
